txt_en: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously.
txt_cn: 如果人诚实、勇敢地面对生活，就能从经历中获得成长。
author: 埃莉诺·罗斯福

txt_en: Do not linger to gather flowers to keep them, but walk on, for flowers will keep themselves blooming all your way.
txt_cn: 不要流连于采集花朵，只管向前走，一路上自会有百花盛开。
author: 泰戈尔

txt_en: All your lights are red, but I'm green to go.
txt_cn: 你哪怕示以红灯拒我前行，我也会心向绿灯一刻不停。
author: Troye Sivan, "BLUE"

txt_en: It's supposed to be hard. If it wasn't hard, everyone would do it.
txt_cn: 要做成一件事情本来就不容易，要是不难，岂不是谁都会去做？
author: 《红粉联盟》

txt_en: The best way out is always through.
txt_cn: 找到出口的最好方式就是一路走到底。
author: Robert Frost

txt_en: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
txt_cn: 改变你的想法，就是改变了你的世界。
author: Norman Vincent Peale

txt_en: Respect other people's feelings. It might mean nothing to you, but it could mean everything to them.
txt_cn: 尊重他人的感受。这对你可能无关紧要，但可能对他人十分重要。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: In the middle of every difficulty comes opportunity.
txt_cn: 每一个困境中都会出现机会。
author: Albert Einstein

txt_en: Where there is ruin, there is hope for a treasure.
txt_cn: 凡是有废墟的地方，就有可能藏着宝藏。
author: Jalaluddin Rumi

txt_en: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
txt_cn: 想象力让我们突破极限。
author: John Muir

txt_en: All achievements, all earned riches, have their beginning in an idea.
txt_cn: 所有的成就和财富都是从一个想法开始的。
author: Napolean Hill

txt_en: The more things you do, the more you can do.
txt_cn: 你做的事情越多，能做到的事情就越多。
author: Lucille Ball

txt_en: To know yourself is the first and most important step in pursuing your dreams and goals.
txt_cn: 了解自己是追求梦想和目标的第一步，也是最重要的一步。
author: Stedman Graham

txt_en: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
txt_cn: 你今天做的事要让未来的你心存感激。
author: Sean Patrick Flanery

txt_en: It's not so much how busy you are, but why you are busy.
txt_cn: 重要的不是你有多忙，而是你为何而忙。
author: Mary Flannery O'Connor

txt_en: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
txt_cn: 成功的勇士也是普通人，但却具有激光般的专注力。
author: 李小龙

txt_en: I'll spend forever wondering if you knew I was enchanted to meet you.
txt_cn: 遇见你，我心花怒放，愿用一生去猜你是否明了。
author: Taylor Swift, "Enchanted"

txt_en: I see that I am a little piece of a big, big universe, and that makes things right.
txt_cn: 我知道我只是这浩瀚宇宙的一粒尘埃，但却是不可或缺的一份子。
author: 《南国野兽》

txt_en: If you don't imagine, nothing ever happens at all.
txt_cn: 想象都不去想象，就什么都不会发生。
author: John Green

txt_en: Years may wrinkle the skin, but to give up enthusiasm wrinkles the soul.
txt_cn: 岁月留痕，只及肌肤；激情不再，皱起心灵。
author: Samuel Ullman

txt_en: Life is only interesting if life is wide.
txt_cn: 生活只有变得宽广，才会有趣。
author: 《杀死汝爱》

txt_en: Challenges make you discover things about yourself that you never really knew.
txt_cn: 挑战能让你发现自己都不曾了解过的一面。
author: Cicely Tyson

txt_en: Keep your best wishes, close to your heart and watch what happens.
txt_cn: 一直怀揣着最美的愿望，倾听内心的声音，再看看会发生什么。
author: Tony DeLiso

txt_en: It is easy to live for others, everybody does. I call on you to live for yourself.
txt_cn: 为他人而活很简单，每个人都可以做到。我号召你们为自己而活。
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

txt_en: Change, like healing, takes time.
txt_cn: 改变犹如伤口愈合，需要时间。
author: Veronica Roth

txt_en: Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim.
txt_cn: 成为人生的女主角，而不是受害者，这才是最重要的。
author: Nora Ephron

txt_en: If you do not believe you can do it, then you have no chance at all.
txt_cn: 如果你不相信自己能做到，你就永远没有机会做到。
author: Arsene Wenger

txt_en: Dripping water hollows out stone, not through force but through persistence.
txt_cn: 水滴石穿非力之所能为，乃能持之以恒也。
author: Ovid

txt_en: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
txt_cn: 工作中最重要的部分是开始阶段。
author: Plato
